messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: The economy of our area is based upon public spending. From Keswick to Millom, our jobs and services rely upon the public investment and only Labour can promise to continue this investment, to grow our jobs and to protect our futures.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: New health facilities and world-class healthcare, new jobs for local people, town centre regeneration and continued nuclear investments.
Schools, police and the NHS increased support for all our pensioners and those in need of elderly care.

issues.education: New schools, world-class healthcare, more local services
issues.health: New health facilities and world-class healthcare

housing.content: With Labour we are building new schools, creating new universities and building new social housing, creating thousands of jobs and securing our local economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP I will continue to work to protect our local economic future and ensure that Copeland continues to receive the investment we deserve.

politicalExperience.achievements: One of Parliament's youngest MP’s representing England’s most remote constituency after leaving university. Third generation Sellafield worker.

images.caption: Jamie Reed in discussions about healthcare
Local community and industry leaders support Jamie Reed
